body_html: I can independently confirm this bug. Tried this with Tensorflow 1.0, [CUDA 8.0.44, 8.0.61], cuDNN 5.1, Ubuntu 16.04 LTS, [Tesla K80, GTX 1080]. This even crashes at w_size = 8 in some cases. Are there any updates?
